p: My client are an established agricultural Biotech who are a world leader within their space. They are seeking a Bioinformatician to join the team in running their trademarked gene-editing technology.

li: Maintain the software, including designing QA tests
li.1: Contribute to the development of the software to implement improvements
li.3: Support others with interpreting the results from the use of the software
li.4: Work alongside other Bioinformaticians for reviewing code and collaborate with biologists

li: MSc in Bioinformatics, Software development, or related discipline, with at least 2 years experience following this
li.2: Programming in Python with familiarity with other languages such as R, Perl, Bash
li.3: Experience with workflow management systems such as Nextflow, Snakemake etc.
li.6: An engineering mindset- identifies problems and investigates anomalies, and suggests improvements

li: Flexible working - This position can be fully remote within the UK, fully onsite, or hybrid

p.11: Please apply via this job posting, or contact me for more details.
